description:
DuckDuckGo has released a platform that allows users to interact with popular AI chatbots privately, ensuring that their data remains secure and protected. The service, accessible at Duck.ai, is globally available and features a light and clean user interface. Users can choose from four AI models: two closed-source models and two open-source models. The closed-source... Read more »

The post DuckDuckGo releases portal giving private access to AI models appeared first on AI News.
title: DuckDuckGo releases portal giving private access to AI models
